Hiya, Joe

Thanks for this info - the antipattern you're describing does in=
deed 
sound awfully familiar, and is making us do a lot of Mocking. 

Hmmm.=
.. consultancy - Now that IS a good idea! It's something we 
discussed in t=
he team a while back, and management were making hopeful 
noises about. My =
plan was to speak with Da Boss on Monday about all 
this, and but I've just=

(new baby - awww!), so it m=
ight have to wait a bit. But I'm pretty sure

his, as soon as I can get to discuss it
